attributes.additional_details: As Johnson has decided to back Patel despite clearly having broken ministerial code, the only way for her to be fired is if parliament place significant pressure on the Prime Minister to sack Patel.
attributes.background: Parliament must pressure Johnson into firing Priti Patel following the investigation which found that her approach “amounted to behaviour that can be described as bullying”.

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honours or appointments. That includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or to resign.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could sign or start a petition about that.
